title: Organizational Learning Readiness Assessment Design and Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of introductory organizational behavior and research methodologies
context.additional_context: A competency development program for office/administrative professionals, focusing on designing and analyzing surveys to assess organizational learning readiness.

learning_goals: Ability to explain the step-by-step process of designing organizational learning readiness assessment instruments
Application of content validity verification methods (expert review, cognitive interviewing) during survey item development
Evaluation of survey data reliability using multilevel analysis techniques (ICC, omega coefficient)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
